items.name: Welcome
items.label:
![Welcome](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44091884/110853974-2f087000-82ac-11eb-9990-436d9e608732.png) ####

Evaluating the effects of COVID-19 on Digital Learning from March 2020.

####

You are being asked to participate in this 20 MINUTE SURVEY (30 QUESTIONS IN TOTAL) to create a profile of the 2020/2021 digital landscape and experiences by staff and students in TU Dublin. By asking you these questions, we aim to collect feedback on what worked, and did not work, in terms of digital learning during the pandemic. Questions are based on the INDEx (Irish National Digital Experience) survey which staff and students completed in 2019, with some additions relevant to teaching and learning spaces and experiences post COVID. ####

As a student, your opinions and expectations must be accommodated into the design and improvement of any digital services provided by TU Dublin. Covid-19 rapidly changed how third-level education was taught. In light of this, it is important to reflect on the positives and negatives of our online experiences. 16 Through your feedback, we aim to inform decisions and improve TU Dublin’s digital campus. A report summarising survey results, including a comparison with 2019’s INDEx survey results will be circulated internally in TU Dublin to all interested parties. We may also consider publishing results in a peer-reviewed publication. Your personal data will not be used for any other purpose. ####

For further information contact: ####

geraldine.gray@tudublin.ie (TU Dublin Blanchardstown campus) ####

eugene.hickey@tudublin.ie (TU Dublin Tallaght Campus) ####

kevin.orourke@tudublin.ie (TU Dublin City campus) ####

cormac.mcmahon@tudublin.ie (TU Dublin City campus)
